content:
# Factorio Execution Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) that receives iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x2) that receives iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x1) that receives coal
- Stone furnace (position x2) that receives coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available and not busy before inserting items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing, to avoid empty extractions.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
